          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gašenje</string>

            <string language="sl">Učenje gašenja z vodo je lahko zelo zanimivo...</string>
            <string language="en">Learning how to extinguishing fire with the use of a jet of water.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprendiendo cómo a extinguir el fuego con el uso
